title: Financial Model Basics Sprint
subtitle: Build your first financial model without finance expertise
outcome: A working financial model with P&L, cash flow, and key assumptions documented

agenda.title: Introduction to Financial Models
agenda.details: Why you need one, what it includes, and how to use it

agenda.title: Revenue Model & Assumptions
agenda.details: Build your revenue model with realistic assumptions

agenda.title: Cost Structure & Expenses
agenda.details: Map your fixed and variable costs

agenda.title: P&L & Cash Flow
agenda.details: Build profit & loss and cash flow statements

agenda.title: Key Metrics & Scenarios
agenda.details: Identify KPIs and build scenario models

agenda.title: Review & Next Steps
agenda.details: Validate your model and set up regular review cadence

whoItsFor: Non-financial founders who need to build a financial model
Founders who need to make data-driven decisions
whoItsNotFor: Teams with existing professional financial models
